Test Name: Yellow Faced Hornet Venom IgE, Serum
Purpose: To measure immunoglobulin E (IgE) antibodies specific to Yellow Faced Hornet venom for diagnostic evaluation.
Container: Red-top tube or serum separator tube (SST)
Equipment: Automated immunoanalyzer for IgE testing (e.g., ImmunoCAP System), centrifuge, refrigerated/ultra-low freezer
